description: Team 3150N Nighthawks is a competitive VEX V5 robotics team from Ontario, Canada, dedicated to innovation, excellence, and STEM education. Part of the Silver Owl Robotics organization, we compete in regional, provincial, and international competitions.

achievements.event: Toronto February VEX V5 Robotics Competition
achievements.description: Recognized for outstanding engineering notebook and design process documentation
Qualified for Ontario Provincial Championships through consistent performance

goals: Achieve Top 10 Skills Ranking in Canada

maintainerNote: Team 3150N Nighthawks maintains the VEX V5 Hub as a community resource for all VEX robotics teams worldwide.
